messages.content:
Analyze this build manifest to identify the programming language. Respond with JSON only.

File: universalbuild.json
Content:
[
  {
    "build": {
      "cache": [
        ".cache/pip"
      ],
      "commands": [
        "pip install --user --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt"
      ],
      "env": {},
      "packages": [
        "python-3.14",
        "py3.14-pip",
        "build-base"
      ]
    },
    "metadata": {
      "build_system": "pip",
      "confidence": 0.949999988079071,
      "framework": "Flask",
      "language": "Python",
      "project_name": "app",
      "reasoning": "Detected from requirements.txt

Response format:
{
  "name": "LanguageName",
  "file_extensions": [".ext"],
  "package_managers": ["manager1"],
  "excluded_dirs": ["node_modules", "target"],
  "workspace_configs": ["package.json"],
  "env_vars": ["PORT", "NODE_ENV"],
  "health_endpoints": ["/health", "/ready"],
  "default_port": 3000,
  "runtime_name": "node",
  "version_pattern": "\"version\": \"(.+?)\"",
  "default_entrypoint": "index.js",
  "env_var_patterns": [["PORT", "\\bport\\s*=\\s*(\\d+)"]],
  "port_patterns": [["listen", "\\blisten\\((\\d+)"]],
  "health_check_patterns": [["health", "\\/health"]],
  "confidence": 0.95
}
